text: The International Society of City and Regional Planners (ISOCARP) is an international association of people who work in urban planning. It was created in 1965. It now has members from more than 80 countries. ISOCARP is formally recognised by the United Nations and Council of Europe. It works with UNESCO. It is not under the control of any government. == Other websites == * ISOCARP * ISOCARP institute Category:Urban planning organizations Category:International organizations Category:1965 establishments
title: ISOCARP
